### About

::: {#hero-heading}
Oksana is deeply passionate about environmental data science and its critical role in the decarbonization and energy sectors. She holds an MBA from San Francisco State University and a Master's degree at Bren School, University of California, Santa Barbara. With eight years of experience as a Business Analyst and Technical Product Manager at Tesla Inc., she is now actively pursuing a career pivot into environmental data science with a focus on energy systems and grid resilience. Her goal is to help companies solve complex data challenges in the energy transition and decarbonization sectors.

## Education

Master of Environmental Data Science \| University of California, Santa Barbara </br> Master of Business Administration \| California State University, San Francisco
:::
